properties.name: Arena Apartments Manchester - Apt 5
properties.summary: This is a stunning, brand new apartment located in Manchester city centre. It is located in a Grade II listed building and boasts exposed brickwork and brand new fixtures, fittings and furnishings. Free Wi-Fi throughout. Excellent location!
properties.space: Sleeps upto 7 people.   This apartment includes the following:   • One double bedroom with a triple bunk bed • Double bed deck with a skylight • Double sofa bed • Ceiling mounted 50inch LCD TV
properties.description: This is a stunning, brand new apartment located in Manchester city centre. It is located in a Grade II listed building and boasts exposed brickwork and brand new fixtures, fittings and furnishings. Free Wi-Fi throughout. Excellent location! Sleeps upto 7 people.   This apartment includes the following:   • One double bedroom with a triple bunk bed • Double bed deck with a skylight • Double sofa bed • Ceiling mounted 50inch LCD TV The apartment is accessed through the coded front door and is one of 5 units. The apartment door is accessed via a key-card secure lock. All communal corridors are covered by 24/7 CCTV for your safety and security. Unfortunately, we regret that due to the nature of the building we have no disabled access to the apartment This apartment is located in Manchester city centre. The building is conveniently located within only 5 minutes' walk to all the best places to visit in Manchester - Arndale shopping centre, Market Street, Printworks, transport links - includi
properties.neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in Manchester city centre. The building is conveniently located within only 5 minutes' walk to all the best places to visit in Manchester - Arndale shopping centre, Market Street, Printworks, transport links - including Victoria train station, Metrolink tram stop (Victoria) and Metroshuttle free bus stop at Victoria. Closest supermarket is a local Co-Op and it is 2 min walk away and stocks a good range of food and beverages Printworks is 5 min walk away with Odeon cinema, and a range of cafes, pubs and bars. Manchester's iconic bohemian Northern Quarter is 10 min walk away and offers a range of quirky, independent bars, restaurants, coffee shops, cake shops, cocktail bars, as well as shops. Closest ATM is 5 min away, near Manchester Victoria train station and Printworks. Arndale shopping centre is 5 min away and houses all the high street shops Piccadilly gardens with Manchester's ferris wheel is 20 min walk away
properties.transit: Manchester Victoria train and tram stops are only 5 minutes' walk away. There is also a free shuttle bus stop at Victoria. Free city centre maps will be provided in the apartment.
properties.host_about:
Hi
I live and work in Manchester city centre. I have worked in the property and hospitality industries for the past 12 years and enjoy travelling and meeting new people. I like to make my guests feel welcome and at home. 
Feel free to check out the photos and let me know if you have any questions. I will be happy to help.
properties.street: Corporation Street, Manchester, M4, United Kingdom

properties.name: Arena Manchester Apartments - Apt 2
properties.summary: Newly refurbished cosy 1 bed apt, sleeps 6 The bathroom features a double shower with rain shower head, the kitchen is fully fitted (Incl dishwasher) TV in living and bedroom. Spacious, stylish living area. Free wifi  Excellent location
properties.space: This 1 bed apartment and sleeps 6 adults in total - 1 double bedroom and 2x double sofa beds in the living room The living room boasts a 50' flat screen TV and opens to a fully fitted kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped and also has a fitted dishwasher.  From the living area there is further access to a modern bathroom (double shower with rain shower head) and a cosy double bedroom. There is also a flat screen TV in the bedroom. Both the living room and bedroom feature exposed natural brick walls, which adds to the character and cosy feel.

properties.name: Arena Apartments Manchester - Apt 3
properties.summary: This 1-bed apartment has been beautifully refurbished. It is in Manchester city centre and boasts exposed brickwork, secure entrance, fully fitted kitchen and brand new furnishings and fittings. It is very cosy and boasts all mod-cons, incl free wifi
properties.space: This is a cosy and comfortable space that sleeps 4. Exposed brickwork in the living and bedroom areas adds to the character and cosy feel. Everything in this apartment is brand new. The sleeping arrangements are - 2 in a double bedroom and double sofa bed in the living room for 2, so 4 in total. There are 50' TVs in both the bedroom and the living room and the kitchen is fully fitted and furnished with all the necessary utensils. WiFi is high speed and is free throughout your stay. The apartment is located only 3 minutes walk from Manchester Arena concert venue, 5 minutes' walk to Manchester Victoria train and tram stops as well as all the night life and shopping Manchester has to offer

properties.neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in Manchester city centre. The building is conveniently located within only 5 minutes' walk to all the best places to visit in Manchester - Arndale shopping centre, Market Street, Printworks, transport links - including Victoria train station, Metrolink tram stop (Victoria) and Metroshuttle free bus stop at Victoria. Closest supermarket is a local Co-Op and it is 2 min walk away and stocks a good range of food and beverages Printworks is 5 min walk away with Odeon cinema, and a range of cafes, pubs and bars. Manchester's iconic bohemian Northern Quarter is 10 min walk away and offers a range of quirky, independent bars, restaurants, coffee shops, cake shops, cocktail bars, as well as shops. Closest ATM is 5 min away, near Manchester Victoria train station and Printworks. Arndale shopping centre is 5 min away and houses all the high street shops Piccadilly gardens with Manchester's ferris wheel is 20 min walk away
properties.notes: WiFi is free throughout your stay and it's excellent  Towels and linen are provided
properties.transit: Manchester Victoria has a tram stop and a Metroshuttle free bus stop and both are only 5 minutes walk away from the front door. Major transport links like Manchester Victoria train station are also only 5 minutes' walk away. Piccadilly train station is accessible by tram (10 min) or 20 min walk and offers quick links to Manchester Airport (trains run every 20 min and the journey is about 20 min long). A local private hire taxi offers a set rate to Manchester airport (£18 one way, which is quite affordable if there are 2 or more passengers)
